plot outline: A struggling film assistant director (Alby) marries his lady love against his family wishes. The couple lives in a financial crunch which makes Alby to take extreme steps thus exposing legal problems. The story gets better after the arrival of a shrewd police officer
title: Oru Cinemakkaran
plot: Alby, who is a passionate and hardworking filmmaker, begins to face financial liabilities. Being stressed, he soon gets involved in a thoughtless act and finds himself in an unpredictable situation.

A struggling film assistant director (Alby) marries his lady love against his family wishes. The couple lives in a financial crunch which makes Alby to take extreme steps thus exposing legal problems. The story gets better after the arrival of a shrewd police officer::Shabi Shahul

Alby, who is married to the girl he loves, Sara, against the will of both their families. While the couple leads a romantic life in a residential complex in Kochi, Alby, who is a passionate and hardworking filmmaker, begins to face financial liabilities. Being stressed, he soon gets involved in a thoughtless act and finds himself in an unpredictable situation. Alby's life then begins to go beyond his control.
